Package edu.cmu.cs.prt

Class PrtInfo

java.lang.Object
edu.cmu.cs.prt.PrtInfo
public final class PrtInfo extends Object
A static utility class for fetching information about stops and routes in the Pittsburgh Regional Transit system.

Example usage

Getting the routes that go through a given stop using closestStop(Location) and routesThru(Stop).

 Location location = ...
 Stop stop = PrtInfo.closestStop(location);
 List<Route> routes = PrtInfo.routesThru(stop);

  • Method Details

    • stopsFor

      public static List<Stop> stopsFor(Route route, RouteDirection direction) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Returns all the stops for the specified route in the given direction. A route's stops are defined as the stops on the route that a vehicle picks up and/or drops passengers at.

      Note: this method queries the PRT backend for the requested information and may block indefinitely.

      Parameters:
      route - route to get stops for
      direction - the direction of the route to get stops for
      Returns:
      stops for the specified route
      Throws:
      IOException - if the request to the PRT backend fails
      InterruptedException - if the request to the PRT backend is interrupted

    • closestStop

      public static Stop closestStop(Location location)
      Returns the closest stop to the given location.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to find the closest stop to
      Returns:
      the closest stop to the given location

    • stopsNear

      public static List<Stop> stopsNear(Location location, double distanceFeet)
      Returns all the stops that are within the specified distance of the given location.
      Parameters:
      location - the location to find stops near
      distanceFeet - the distance in feet around this location to find stops in
      Returns:
      the stops that are within the specified distance of the given location
